DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess safety measure pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics CS-8080 healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Multiple Doses CS-8080 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy men and/or woman , age 18 45 year inclusive . WOCBP pregnant nursing , must use medically acceptable method contraception least 3 month prior study screen All woman must negative quantitative serum pregnancy test screening , Day 4 , within 24 hour dose . Male subject must agree donate sperm study 3 month last scheduled visit . Males must also agree use use condom spermicide whenever engage sexual activity period time . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m inclusive weight < 300 lb . Good health determine absence clinically significant deviation normal , base medical history , physical examination , laboratory report , 12lead ECG , deem Investigator , prior enrollment . Able understand willing comply study requirement , willing follow study medication regimen . Willing able give write informed consent . Negative urine test drug abuse alcohol screening checkin . Negative result HIV antibody , hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody screen . Subjects must agree donate blood , plasma , platelet , blood component study 4 week last dose . WOCBP pregnant ( base test result ) breast feed . Subject use adequate contraceptive precaution . Any history drug abuse . History alcohol addiction 2 year prior Day 1 . History significant allergic response drug except penicillin , know sensitivity product administer dose . History current evidence , determine Investigator , psychiatric emotional problem would invalidate give informed consent limit ability subject comply study requirement . History current evidence clinically significant cardiac , hepatic , renal , pulmonary , endocrine , neurologic , infectious , gastrointestinal ( ie , condition may affect drug absorption ) , hematologic , oncologic disease determine Investigator review screen history , physical examination , laboratory test result , 12lead ECG . History current alcoholic nonalcoholic liver disease liver steatosis . History prostate disease prostatitis . Subjects history congenital Long QT Syndrome ( LQTS ) , history survive neardrowning episode , history form syncope loss consciousness . Subjects QTcF interval duration > 450 msec obtain average ECG machine reading triplicate ECG ( 3 reading 2 minute apart ) take screening , least 10 minute quiet rest supine position . Subjects abnormal ECG waveform morphology ECGs screening triplicate would preclude accurate manual measurement QT interval duration . Need concomitant medication . Prestudy medication use specify protocol . Consumption food beverage contain grapefruit 7 day prior Day 1 study completion . Consumption food beverage contain alcohol 24 hour checkin discharge clinic . Blood donation significant blood loss within 56 day Day 1 . Plasma donation within 7 day Day 1 . Participation another investigational new drug research study within 30 day Day 1 . Prior exposure CS8080 . Use tobacco product nicotinecontaining product ( include smoke cessation aid , gum patch ) within 6 month Day 1 . Relationship subject Investigator , subinvestigator , pharmacist , study coordinator , staff directly involve conduct study , employment Sponsor contract research organization participate study . Familial relationship study participant . Screening laboratory value outside range normal value deem clinically significant Investigator . Serum lipid test , triglyceride , cholesterol ( LDL , HDL total cholesterol ) , liver function test ( ALT , AST , GGT , total bilirubin , LDH ALP ) PSA must exceed upper limit normal without permission Sponsor . For male , testosterone , LH FSH must within normal limit . Hemoglobin < 12.0 g/dL screen visit . Positive fecal occult blood test screening . Shift work , defined work shift , either regular irregular , preclude sleep hour 10 pm 6 , within 1 week prior Day 4 , 2 work shift per week meeting criterion 4 1 week prior Day 4 . Any following , determined render subject ineligible hepatic MRI scanning : pacemaker , aneurism clip , heart valve replacement , cochlear implant , neuro spinestimulator , pessary ( bladder support ) , body pierce remove , metal sliver eye , shrapnel , hear aid remove , nonremovable metal dental work denture , tattoo 20 year old , IUD penile implant . An Xray may require ass eligibilty procedure . History claustrophobia intolerance MRI scanning procedure .
